title: Journey AI Engagement Scores
description: Journey AI Engagement Scores provide likelihoods of a customer engaging with a newly delivered message.

xdm:emailChannel.title: emailChannel
xdm:emailChannel.description: Engagement scores for email channel messages

xdm:clickEngagementScore.title: clickEngagementScore
xdm:clickEngagementScore.description: probability for a customer to click on links in an email

xdm:openEngagementScore.title: openEngagementScore
xdm:openEngagementScore.description: probability of a customer to open an email

xdm:retentionLevel.title: retentionLevel
xdm:retentionLevel.description: qualitative categorization of customer's likelihood of staying subscribed to the email list

xdm:retentionPercentRank.title: retentionPercentRank
xdm:retentionPercentRank.description: percentile rank of the likelihood of staying subscribed to the email list

xdm:unsubscriptionProbability.title: unsubscriptionProbability
xdm:unsubscriptionProbability.description: the probability for recipient to unsubscribe from email channel given one email opened

xdm:scoreInfo.title: scoreInfo
xdm:scoreInfo.description: model version and score date as a concatenated string
